ISOAlpha2LanguageCodeType.title: Language name code
ISOAlpha2LanguageCodeType.description:
Code specifying the language name.

Code list responsible agency:
ISO

Code list responsible agency name:
International Organization for Standardization

Code list responsible agency code:
5

Code list:
639-1

Code list name:
Language codes (alpha-2)

Code list version:
2002

Code list issue date:
CL 2017-12
